name: Insane Roller Ball Sample
description:
Created by Karen Bourgeois

This is the completion of my class project. Watch out for the cubes. Use the arrow keys to move the ball around. Get 5 coins in level 1 and 10 in level two. Other Platforms coming.

I wish to take this time to Thank you for reviewing my work.  I have added the following elements:

  1. Added Columns to level two
  2. Second level
  3. Different skybox
  4. Different Material
